decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful spells in the colors of blue and red. By utilizing cards like Winternight Stories, Marauding Mako, and Fear of Missing Out, you can quickly establish a threatening board presence while also disrupting your opponent's game plan with counter spells and removal. With a mix of creatures with evasion and burn spells to finish off your opponent, you aim to quickly close out the game before they have a chance to stabilize.

This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of flying creatures and disruptive spells. With cards like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner, the deck aims to control the board while dealing damage with Deep-Cavern Bat and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares. Enduring Curiosity helps draw additional cards, while Tragic Trajectory and Stab offer removal options. The deck also includes some protection with Soulstone Sanctuary and Spell Pierce. Overall, this deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain control throughout the game.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by using a combination of removal spells, card draw, and counter spells to disrupt the opponent's strategy. It also includes a mix of versatile cards like Mystic Teachings and Three Steps Ahead to help set up the player's game plan. By efficiently managing resources and disrupting the opponent's plays, this deck aims to outlast and outmaneuver the opposition until it can secure a victory with its powerful finishers like Ultima and Jeskai Revelation.

The main concept of this deck is to assemble the combo pieces, specifically Omniscience, in order to cast powerful spells for free and overwhelm the opponent with massive creatures and overwhelming board presence. The deck focuses on ramp and card draw to quickly find and play Omniscience, allowing the player to cast spells without paying their mana cost. By utilizing cards like Uthros, Titanic Godcore and Roiling Dragonstorm, the deck aims to create a massive advantage and secure victory through overwhelming force and pressure.

The main focus of this deck revolves around quickly building up a board presence with low-cost creatures like Elegy Acolyte and Nurturing Pixie, while also utilizing disruptive spells such as Tragic Trajectory and Get Lost to control the opponent's board. The deck aims to maintain constant pressure on the opponent by efficiently using its mana and taking advantage of synergies between cards like Nowhere to Run and Overlord of the Balemurk. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Sunpearl Kirin and Cosmogrand Zenith provide additional support and versatility to adapt to different situations.

The key concept of this deck revolves around quickly building up a board presence and aggression through the use of low-cost creatures and spells that disrupt the opponent's strategy. By combining aggressive creatures like Sunpearl Kirin and Elegy Acolyte with removal spells like Tragic Trajectory and Seam Rip, this deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and control the game tempo. Additionally, cards like Elspeth, Storm Slayer and Cosmogrand Zenith provide additional ways to apply pressure and close out games efficiently. The mana base is optimized to support a fast and aggressive playstyle.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming your opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful spells. By playing low-cost creatures like Marauding Mako and Vivi Ornitier, along with spells like Torch the Tower and Opt to control the board, you can apply pressure early and often. The goal is to deal damage quickly and efficiently, utilizing the card draw and tempo advantage provided by cards like Winternight Stories and Agatha's Soul Cauldron. With a mix of creatures and spells, this deck aims to maintain a strong presence on the board while keeping the pressure on your opponent.

The deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive plays and controlling the board using a combination of powerful creatures and spells. The key strategy is to maintain a high tempo, utilizing efficient creatures like Marauding Mako and Steamcore Scholar to apply pressure, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Abrade and Spell Pierce. The deck also utilizes card draw and card selection to ensure consistency in executing its game plan, while also having some protection with Quantum Riddler and Fear of Missing Out.

The main concept of this deck revolves around utilizing aggressive creatures and cheap spells to overwhelm the opponent with a constant stream of threats. By combining efficient creatures like Frenzied Baloth and Llanowar Elves with cards like Innkeeper's Talent and Royal Treatment, the deck aims to quickly build a board presence and apply pressure. The inclusion of cards like Snakeskin Veil and Sentinel of the Nameless City adds protection and versatility to the deck, allowing it to adapt to different situations while maintaining a relentless tempo.

This deck focuses on aggressively playing creatures and spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. By utilizing efficient cards like Fear of Missing Out, Quantum Riddler, and Marauding Mako, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can set up a strong defense. The inclusion of Vivi Ornitier and Winternight Stories provides additional support and card advantage. With a mix of creature removal, card draw, and counterspells, this deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent and secure victories through fast, aggressive gameplay.

This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on flooding the board with aggressive creatures like Azure Beastbinder and Floodpits Drowner while controlling the opponent with cards like Phantom Interference and Tragic Trajectory. The inclusion of Soulstone Sanctuary and Enduring Curiosity allows for card advantage and resilience in longer games. Key cards like Cecil, Dark Knight and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares provide additional threats and disruption. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly while maintaining enough control to secure victory.

This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. The deck utilizes cards like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Cards like Cecil, Dark Knight and Tishana's Tidebinder provide aggressive threats that can quickly end the game if left unchecked. The deck also includes some removal spells like Stab and Shoot the Sheriff to deal with opposing threats. Overall, the strategy is to apply pressure early and maintain control of the game until victory is achieved.

The deck focuses on deploying aggressive creatures like Sentinel of the Nameless City and Ouroboroid early in the game to pressure the opponent. Supporting cards like Sinkhole Surveyor and Shoot the Sheriff help control the board and clear the way for your creatures to attack. The inclusion of powerful removal spells like Maelstrom Pulse and Tragic Trajectory allows you to deal with threats from your opponent. The deck's manabase is designed to ensure you have the necessary colors to cast your spells efficiently.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells within the Dimir color combination. With a focus on tempo and disruption, the deck aims to apply pressure on the opponent while also controlling the board with cards like Floodpits Drowner and Spyglass Siren. The inclusion of cards like Enduring Curiosity and Bitter Triumph helps maintain card advantage and resilience against removal. Additionally, key cards like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares provide a strong finisher to close out games quickly. This deck prioritizes a proactive game plan while also having answers to threats from the opponent.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful spells. By utilizing cards like Agatha's Soul Cauldron, Into the Flood Maw, and Marauding Mako, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early on and maintain that pressure throughout the game. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Quantum Riddler and Prof's Eidetic Memory to provide card advantage and help maintain momentum. With a combination of efficient creatures and powerful spells, this deck aims to secure a quick victory by leveraging its aggressive strategy.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively use low-cost creatures and spells to quickly build up board presence and apply pressure on the opponent. By efficiently using cards like Enduring Curiosity and Floodpits Drowner, along with strategically utilizing removal cards like Shoot the Sheriff and Tragic Trajectory, the deck aims to control the game tempo and overwhelm the opponent. The inclusion of powerful creatures like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Cecil, Dark Knight further enhances the aggressive strategy, while cards like Soulstone Sanctuary provide resilience and card advantage.
